text: Gumazir maba kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Bizitam nan suirazir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn kɨ biziba bar dar amuam.” A Guizbangɨra, egh nɨ uaghan nɨghnɨgh, bizir maba nɨn dabirabimɨn akurvazir puvatɨ. Guizbangɨra, kɨ fɨrighɨrɨ biziba bar dar amuam. Egh kɨ bizitam ateghtɨ a na damightɨ, kɨ an ingangarir gumazimɨn mɨn ikian kogham.
